thread.title: You wouldn't believe which 90s' actors are turning 50 this year
thread.title_full: You wouldn't believe which 90s' actors are turning 50 this year

title: You wouldn't believe which 90s' actors are turning 50 this year
text: You wouldn't believe which 90s' actors are turning 50 this year You wouldn't believe which 90s' actors are turning 50 this year '18949'}) If you are a 90s kid, you would have seen all of these actors scorching the screen almost 25 years ago. From Madhuri Dixit's dhak-dhak moments to Akshay Kumar's high-octane action scenes, 90s movies were everything filmi. And with the onset of 2017, it is hard to believe that the actors most of us fell in love with in the 90s are set to turn 50.
